description: Aleksandr Dolgopolov, 25, says he fears for his safety as police start investigating his material.
title: Russian comedian who joked about President Putin flees country
title_page: Russian comedian who joked about President Putin flees country - BBC News
maintext: "I can't share where I am right now because I'm afraid it can make things worse for me in some way. I will come back only if there will be a guarantee that I won't be imprisoned because of my beliefs.
